query.prompt:

query.error: **English:** 1 "If I shine for you in the heat of love 2 beyond the way that is seen on earth, 3 so that I overcome the power of your sight,
query.result: 1 "Jika aku bersinar untukmu dalam panasnya cinta 2 di luar cara yang terlihat di bumi, 3 sehingga aku mengalahkan kekuatan pandanganmu,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 non ti maravigliar, ché ciò procede 5 da perfetto veder, che, come apprende, 6 così nel bene appreso move il piede.
query.error: **English:** 4 do not be amazed, for this proceeds 5 from perfect seeing, which, as it apprehends, 6 so moves the foot in the good that is apprehended.
query.result: 4 jangan heran, karena ini berasal 5 dari penglihatan yang sempurna, yang, sebagaimana ia memahami, 6 demikian pula dalam kebaikan yang dipahami menggerakkan langkah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Io veggio ben sì come già resplende 8 ne l’intelletto tuo l’etterna luce, 9 che, vista, sola e sempre amore accende;
query.error: **English:** 7 I see well how the eternal light already shines 8 in your intellect, 9 which, seen, alone and always kindles love;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 e s’altra cosa vostro amor seduce, 11 non è se non di quella alcun vestigio, 12 mal conosciuto, che quivi traluce.
query.error: **English:** 10 and if something else seduces your love, 11 it is nothing but some trace of that, 12 poorly understood, which shines here.
query.result: 10 dan jika sesuatu yang lain merayu cintamu, 11 itu tidak lain hanyalah sebagian jejaknya, 12 yang kurang dipahami, yang bersinar di sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Tu vuo’ saper se con altro servigio, 14 per manco voto, si può render tanto 15 che l’anima sicuri di letigio».
query.error: **English:** 13 You want to know if with another service, 14 for a lesser vow, one can render so much 15 that the soul is secure from dispute.
query.result: 13 Kamu ingin tahu apakah dengan layanan lain, 14 untuk sumpah yang lebih rendah, seseorang dapat memberikan begitu banyak 15 sehingga jiwa aman dari perselisihan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 16 Beatrice began this song; 17 and like one who does not break off his speech, 18 she continued the holy discourse thus:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 22 was the freedom of the will; 23 with which intelligent creatures, 24 and all and only they, were and are endowed.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Or ti parrà, se tu quinci argomenti, 26 l’alto valor del voto, s’è sì fatto 27 che Dio consenta quando tu consenti;
query.error: **English:** 25 Now you will understand, if you reason from this, 26 the high value of the vow, if it is made 27 in such a way that God consents when you consent;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 ché, nel fermar tra Dio e l’omo il patto, 29 vittima fassi di questo tesoro, 30 tal quale io dico; e fassi col suo atto.
query.error: **English:** 28 because, in establishing the pact between God and man, 29 one makes a victim of this treasure, 30 just as I say; and one does so with one's own act.
query.result: 28 karena, dalam menetapkan perjanjian antara Tuhan dan manusia, 29 seseorang menjadikan harta ini sebagai korban, 30 seperti yang kukatakan; dan seseorang melakukannya dengan tindakannya sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Dunque che render puossi per ristoro? 32 Se credi bene usar quel c’hai offerto, 33 di maltolletto vuo’ far buon lavoro.
query.error: **English:** 31 So what can be given in return? 32 If you think to use well what you have offered, 33 you want to make good work from bad material.
query.result: 31 Jadi apa yang dapat diberikan sebagai balasan? 32 Jika kamu pikir untuk menggunakan dengan baik apa yang telah kamu tawarkan, 33 kamu ingin membuat pekerjaan yang baik dari bahan yang buruk.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Apri la mente a quel ch’io ti paleso 41 e fermalvi entro; ché non fa scïenza, 42 sanza lo ritenere, avere inteso.
query.error: **English:** 40 Open your mind to what I reveal to you 41 and hold it within; for without retaining it, 42 having heard is not knowledge.
query.result: 40 Bukalah pikiranmu terhadap apa yang kuungkapkan kepadamu 41 dan simpanlah di dalam; karena tanpa mengingatnya, 42 mendengar bukanlah pengetahuan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 43 Two things are appropriate to the essence 44 of this sacrifice: one is that 45 of which it is made; the other is the appropriateness.
query.result: 43 Dua perkara yang sesuai dengan hakikat 44 pengorbanan ini: yang satu adalah itu 45 dari mana ia dibuat; yang lain adalah kesesuaian.

query.error: **English:** 49 therefore it was necessary for the Hebrews 50 to offer it, even though some other offering 51 was substituted, as you will know.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 52 Yang lainnya, yang terbuka untukmu secara alami, 53 dapat benar-benar sedemikian rupa sehingga kamu tidak akan salah 54 jika diubah dengan zat lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
